original_text: So Solomon finished all his prayers and everything that he wanted to ask the Lord for. He had been down on his knees with his hands lifted up towards the sky in front of the Lord's altar. Now he stood up.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 무릎을 꿇고 손을 펴서 하늘을 향하여 이 기도와 간구로 여호와께 아뢰기를 마치고 여호와의 제단 앞에서 일어나

sentences.original_text: So Solomon finished all his prayers
and everything that he wanted to ask the Lord for
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께 구하고 싶었던 모든 것을 마쳤다

sentences.original_text: He had been down on his knees
with his hands lifted up towards the sky
in front of the Lord's altar
